name: eslint-config-synacor
description: ESLint configuration for Synacor javascript projects

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run buildMain && npm run buildTestRules
scripts.release: git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-beta: git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --tag beta

author: Jason Miller <jasonmiller@synacor.com>
